issue.title: [Java][Gandiva] ProjectorTest.testStringOutput is failed

ARROW-17824 or ARROW-17770 may be related.
`[~jinshang]` Could you take a look at this?

FYI: https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/java/gandiva/src/main/cpp/jni_common.cc#L716 might be executed.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17869?focusedCommentId=17610327) by Jin Shang (jinshang):*
Yeah it's related to ARROW-17824. I'll see what I can do.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17869?focusedCommentId=17616808) by Jin Shang (jinshang):*
Resolved by https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14323. `[~kou]` Could you help close this issue? Thanks.
